definition: set of bells (old Chinese music instrument)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: It is summarized the Bianzhong choreography and the significance of exploring its' Motion Compilation System.
sentences.chinese: 概述了編鐘樂舞及研究其舞蹈動作編排系統的意義。

sentences.english: The research of chime-bells have a long time, far from pre-Qin period.
sentences.chinese: 編鐘研究由來已久，從先秦時期綿延至今。

sentences.english: The program provides hourly and quarter-hourly chimes.
sentences.chinese: 該方案提供了每小時和四分之一每小時編鐘。

sentences.english: Sleigh Bells is described as noise-pop.
sentences.chinese: 斯萊編鐘是噪聲流行描述。

sentences.english: The rows of weeping BianZhong stream, graceful.
It is simply introduced the course of the motion database on a virtual model for the Bianzhong choreography.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了面向編鐘樂舞的虛擬角色的動作庫製作過程。

sentences.english: Classic, clean -lined wood clock chimes on the half hour.
sentences.chinese: 經典，清潔內襯木質時鐘編鐘上半小時。

sentences.english: It is also believed that chimes can help break up bad energy in the home.
sentences.chinese: 它還認爲，編鐘可以幫助打破了在家裏壞的能量。

sentences.english: For the third, a set of chimes would provide music in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 至於第三個，一套編鐘將提供風中的音樂。

sentences.english: Knights dressed like the Terre-Cotta Warriors play heroic dances accompanied with the ancient carillon.
sentences.chinese: 古編鐘樂中，兵馬俑裝扮的武士跳起孔武有力的舞蹈。

sentences.english: It is a true computer game with all the bells and whistles .
sentences.chinese: 它是一個真正的電腦遊戲，與所有的編鐘和口哨。
